title: Pixel 4 - Battery Drain Issue by an Unknown App/ Service
content:
Hi,
I have a strange issue with an "unknown" service or app that is draining battery rather crazy on my phone.
The unknown  part comes from the fact that I can't identify which app or service is responsible for this, in the Battery Usage overview I can just see something that is apparently similar to a PID.

Please tell me if there is  a solution on how I can identify this app/service.
I have also attached some screenshots for a better explanation.

Thank you.
